mutants.code:
def longest_unique_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    set_chars = set()
    res = float('-inf')
    left = 1
    for right in range(n):
        while s[right] in set_chars:
            set_chars.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        set_chars.add(s[right])
        res = max(res, right - left + 1)
    return res

def longest_unique_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    set_chars = set()
    res = float('-inf')
    left = -1
    for right in range(n):
        while s[right] in set_chars:
            set_chars.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        set_chars.add(s[right])
        res = max(res, right - left + 1)
    return res

def longest_unique_substring(s):

    res = float('')

def longest_unique_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    set_chars = set()
    res = float('-inf')
    left = 0
    for right in range(n):
        while s[right] not in set_chars:
            set_chars.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        set_chars.add(s[right])
        res = max(res, right - left + 1)
    return res

def longest_unique_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    set_chars = set()
    res = float('-inf')
    left = 0
    for right in range(n):
        while s[right] in set_chars:
            set_chars.remove(s[left])
            left -= 1
        set_chars.add(s[right])
        res = max(res, right - left + 1)
    return res

def longest_unique_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    set_chars = set()
    res = float('-inf')
    left = 0
    for right in range(n):
        while s[right] in set_chars:
            set_chars.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        set_chars.add(s[right])
        res = max(res, (right - left) * 1)
    return res

def longest_unique_substring(s):
    n = len(s)
    set_chars = set()
    res = float('-inf')
    left = 0
    for right in range(n):
        while s[right] in set_chars:
